spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacency are highly accurate. Most doors are correctly placed, though some swing directions are simplified. Window apertures are present but lack precise glass-pane resolution. Scalability is well-maintained throughout the model.

structural_fidelity.notes: The roof is correctly removed with all internal walls visible. No rooms are missing. The model is correctly floating on a dark background. Points deducted for minor wall thickness inconsistencies and slight rounding of structural corners.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of block-style furniture. The kitchen island, sofas, and beds are positioned according to the floor plan. The car in the garage is a significant fidelity win.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Adheres to the low-poly, flat-shaded requirement. No textures or photorealism present. The camera is isometric, though slightly narrower field of view than a perfect 45-degree orthographic projection.

detected_errors.description: Minor distortion in the entry portico and verandah alignment compared to the exact plan lines.
Slight structural reinterpretation of the laundry and walk-in-linen area wall junctions.
